mapper.select: SELECT prod_num, product_count FROM cart_table where m_num=#{m_num}
mapper.update: update cart_table set product_count = #{product_count} where prod_num=#{prod_num} and m_num=#{m_num}
mapper.insert: insert into cart_table( m_num, prod_num, product_count ) values(#{m_num}, #{prod_num}, #{product_count})
mapper.delete: delete from cart_table where prod_num=#{prod_num} and m_num=#{m_num}
